films.name: The Shawshank Redemption
films.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

films.name: The Dark Knight
films.description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

films.name: Inception
films.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

films.name: Fight Club
films.description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

films.name: Forrest Gump
films.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary life.

films.name: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
